TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataPagerFieldCollection extends System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection

summary.span: 表示 控件所使用的 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that are used by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 类以编程方式管理一组 对象。You can use the class to programmatically manage a set of objects. 请注意，更常见的做法是以声明方式（而不是以编程方式）定义这些字段。Note that it is more typical to define these fields declaratively instead of programmatically. 您可以通过属性访问类的属性和方法 。You can access the properties and methods of the class through the property. 您可以通过使用类的适当方法，添加、插入和移除 对象 。You can add, insert, and remove objects by using the appropriate methods of the class. 若要以编程方式 从集合中检索对象，请执行以下操作之一：To programmatically retrieve objects from a collection, do one of following: - 使用索引器 从集合中获取单个对象。Use the indexer to get a single object from the collection. - 使用 方法创建一个实现的对象 ，然后您可以使用该对象从集合中获取项。Use the method to create an object that implements , which you can then use to get items from the collection. 属性获取集合中的总项数。The property gets the total number of items in the collection. 它通常用于确定集合的上限。It is typically used to determine the upper bound of the collection. 您可以使用 、 、 和方法添加项并删除集合中的项 。You can add items and remove items in the collection by using the , , , and methods.

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

param.name: index
param.span: 要从由 方法返回的类型的排序列表创建的 类型的索引。

summary.span: 创建由提供的索引标识的 类型的默认实例。

span.span: Creates a default instance of the type that is identified by the provided index.

returns.span: 根据提供的索引，表示从 类派生的类的实例的对象。

span.span: An object that represents an instance of a class that is derived from the class, according to the index provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 在方法的实现中由集合在内部调用 。The method is called internally by the collection in its implementation of the method. 方法使用指定的标识的类型创建对象的实例 `index` ，该类型映射到该方法返回的类型之一 。The method creates an instance of an object by using the type identified by the specified `index`, which maps to one of the types returned by the method.

exception.span: 指定的索引不在已识别的范围内。

span.span: The specified index is not in the recognized range.
